title: There are two "quarkus-logging-json" extensions

labels.name: area/housekeeping
labels.description: Issue type for generalized tasks not related to bugs or enhancements

body:
### Description

One is under the quarkus group ID, the other in the quarkiverse group ID.

![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/49238587/3e663044-3313-4d35-aaca-cb4ab22eb1ad)

https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/tree/main/extensions/logging-json
```xml
        <dependency>
            <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
            <artifactId>quarkus-logging-json</artifactId>
        </dependency>
```

https://github.com/quarkiverse/quarkus-logging-json
```xml
        <dependency>
            <groupId>io.quarkiverse.loggingjson</groupId>
            <artifactId>quarkus-logging-json</artifactId>
            <version>3.0.0</version>
        </dependency>
```

### Implementation ideas

They should be merged to one.
